dtd-info.name: Ontopia Schema Language
dtd-info.descr: The Ontopia Schema Language is a schema language for topic maps. Schemas using the OSL can constrain and document the structure of topic maps, and can be used to validate topic maps as well as to provide users with better interfaces for editing them.

element.name: association
element.descr: Defines an association class. Contains the constraints on a class of associations.

element.name: any
element.descr: Any topic. Used as a wildcard to specify any topic whatsoever.
